    • Method Detail

      • isPreserveInstance

        public boolean isPreserveInstance()
        Returns:
        true if the serialized task instance is preserved in the deserialized task. If true then the instance id and transient variables are deserialized, if false they are discarded.

      • setPreserveInstance

        public void setPreserveInstance(boolean state)
        Sets whether serialized task instance is preserved in the deserialized task. If true then the instance id and transient variables are deserialized, if false they are discarded.

      • readComponent

        public Tool readComponent(TrianaProperties properties)
                   throws TaskGraphException,
                          java.io.IOException
        Read method.
        Returns:
        a TrianaIOComponent containing the abstract representation of either a ToolImp, TaskGraphImp or TaskGraphLayout.
        Throws:
        TaskGraphException
        java.io.IOException

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Close the stream. Once a stream has been closed, further createTool(), ready(), mark(), or reset() invocations will throw an IOException. Closing a previously-closed stream, however, has no effect.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs
